name: Flop Guy Original
description:
Back in December, I started a new test project: Flop Guy. In January, I finished it and uploaded it to Gamejolt. It didn't do well at all. I hope it does well here on itch.io.

Play as the Flop Guy and maneuver your way down to the ground. But watch: enemies are always there to attack. And watch out for the greatest boss fight ever at the end...

The white circle is a joystick; use it to maneuver.
